entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
